hibernate-mapping.sql-query: call SEM.SEM_SP_MRT003_PAY(?, cast(:paymentGroupNo as varchar), cast(:depositAmt as numeric),cast(:paymentType as varchar), cast(:paymentMethod as varchar) , cast(:chqDt as date) , cast(:chqReceiveDt as date), cast(:transferDt as date), cast(:remark as varchar), cast(:userId as varchar))
